name: Rain Man
summary_text: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

name: Zodiac
summary_text: In the late 1960s/early 1970s, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

name: Nightcrawler
summary_text: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

name: 500 Days of Summer
summary_text: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

name: Blade Runner 2049
summary_text: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

name: Casino
summary_text: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
summary_text: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

name: Pacific Rim
summary_text: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

name: Children of Men
summary_text: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

name: Hot Fuzz
summary_text: A skilled London police officer is transferred to a small town with a dark secret.

name: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
summary_text: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.

name: The Hangover Part II
summary_text: Two years after the bachelor party in Las Vegas, Phil, Stu, Alan, and Doug jet to Thailand for Stu's wedding. Stu's plan for a subdued pre-wedding brunch, however, goes seriously awry.

name: It
summary_text: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

name: Star Trek Into Darkness
summary_text: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

name: Bohemian Rhapsody
summary_text: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

name: Captain Marvel
summary_text: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

name: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
summary_text: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

name: The Pursuit of Happyness
summary_text: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
summary_text: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

name: The Butterfly Effect
summary_text: Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
summary_text: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
summary_text: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

name: American Hustle
summary_text: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced to work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the Mafia.

name: The Matrix Revolutions
summary_text: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

name: Lucy
summary_text: A woman, accidentally caught in a dark deal, turns the tables on her captors and transforms into a merciless warrior evolved beyond human logic.

name: Edward Scissorhands
summary_text: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.

name: Baby Driver
summary_text: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

name: Rear Window
summary_text: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

name: Dallas Buyers Club
summary_text: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.

name: The Conjuring
summary_text: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

name: Hancock
summary_text: Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.

name: Hacksaw Ridge
summary_text: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

name: Ice Age
summary_text: The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
summary_text: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

name: American Sniper
summary_text: Navy S.E.A.L. sniper Chris Kyle's pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home with his family after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he can't leave behind.

name: Little Miss Sunshine
summary_text: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

name: Zootopia
summary_text: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

name: The Incredible Hulk
summary_text: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper.

name: Warrior
summary_text: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

name: Love Actually
summary_text: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

name: Rush
summary_text: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

name: The Fifth Element
summary_text: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

name: The Bourne Supremacy
summary_text: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

name: Split
summary_text: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

name: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
summary_text: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

name: Dead Poets Society
summary_text: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

name: Fury
summary_text: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

name: The Wolverine
summary_text: Wolverine comes to Japan to meet an old friend whose life he saved years ago, and gets embroiled in a conspiracy involving yakuza and mutants.

name: The Help
summary_text: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

name: Twilight
summary_text: When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

name: Divergent
summary_text: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
summary_text: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

name: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
summary_text: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

name: Spotlight
summary_text: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

name: Captain Phillips
summary_text: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

name: The Hurt Locker
summary_text: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

name: Kung Fu Panda
summary_text: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.

name: Shrek 2
summary_text: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

name: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
summary_text: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

name: Horrible Bosses
summary_text: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

name: The Maze Runner
summary_text: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

name: Mystic River
summary_text: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

name: Elysium
summary_text: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

name: Crash
summary_text: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
summary_text: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

name: Lost in Translation
summary_text: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

name: War of the Worlds
summary_text: An updated version of H.G Wells' seminal sci-fi classic about an alien invasion threatening the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

name: The Day After Tomorrow
summary_text: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek from Washington, D.C. to New York City to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
summary_text: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

name: Big Fish
summary_text: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
summary_text: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

name: Big Hero 6
summary_text: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

name: A Quiet Place
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

name: The Terminal
summary_text: An Eastern European tourist unexpectedly finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

name: Justice League
summary_text: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

name: The Theory of Everything
summary_text: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

name: Tangled
summary_text: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

name: Gangs of New York
summary_text: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

name: It's a Wonderful Life
summary_text: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

name: Back to the Future Part III
summary_text: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

name: Citizen Kane
summary_text: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

name: We're the Millers
summary_text: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.

name: Quantum of Solace
summary_text: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

name: The Da Vinci Code
summary_text: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

name: The Last Samurai
summary_text: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

name: Coco
summary_text: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

name: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
summary_text: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

name: Green Book
summary_text: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

name: X-Men: Apocalypse
summary_text: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

name: Armageddon
summary_text: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

name: King Kong
summary_text: A greedy film producer assembles a team of moviemakers and sets out for the infamous Skull Island, where they find more than just cannibalistic natives.

name: Training Day
summary_text: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

name: American Gangster
summary_text: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

name: The Princess Bride
summary_text: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
summary_text: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

name: The Mummy
summary_text: At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.

name: In Bruges
summary_text: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

name: Midnight in Paris
summary_text: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

name: Mission: Impossible
summary_text: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

name: Aquaman
summary_text: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

name: Live Free or Die Hard
summary_text: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

name: Unbreakable
summary_text: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

name: Godzilla
summary_text: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

name: Spectre
summary_text: A cryptic message from James Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover the existence of a sinister organisation named SPECTRE. With a new threat dawning, Bond learns the terrible truth about the author of all his pain in his most recent missions.

name: Alice in Wonderland
summary_text: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

name: This Is the End
summary_text: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
summary_text: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
summary_text: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
summary_text: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

name: Star Wars: The Rise Of Skywalker
summary_text: The surviving members of the Resistance face the First Order once again, and the legendary conflict between the Jedi and the Sith reaches its peak, bringing the Skywalker saga to its end.

name: Platoon
summary_text: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
summary_text: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.

name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
summary_text: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

name: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
summary_text: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

name: Tropic Thunder
summary_text: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

name: Saw
summary_text: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

name: The Cabin in the Woods
summary_text: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin, where they get more than they bargained for, discovering the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

name: Unforgiven
summary_text: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

name: 28 Days Later...
summary_text: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

name: American Pie
summary_text: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

name: The Shape of Water
summary_text: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
summary_text: A machine from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a man and a woman from an advanced robotic assassin to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

name: Room
summary_text: Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

name: Ready Player One
summary_text: When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune and control of his world.

name: Sicario
summary_text: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

name: Brave
summary_text: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

name: The Devil Wears Prada
summary_text: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

name: Aladdin
summary_text: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

name: Moneyball
summary_text: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
summary_text: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

name: The Thing
summary_text: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

name: Predator
summary_text: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

name: John Wick: Chapter 2
summary_text: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

name: Cloverfield
summary_text: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

name: Bruce Almighty
summary_text: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

name: Cars
summary_text: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

name: In Time
summary_text: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

name: The Big Short
summary_text: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

name: Amadeus
summary_text: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

name: The Wizard of Oz
summary_text: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.

name: Despicable Me 2
summary_text: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

name: Monty Python's Life of Brian
summary_text: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

name: Furious 6
summary_text: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

name: Madagascar
summary_text: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.

name: Venom
summary_text: A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
summary_text: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

name: Vertigo
summary_text: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

name: Stand by Me
summary_text: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

name: Black Hawk Down
summary_text: 160 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.

name: Die Hard with a Vengeance
summary_text: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

name: Collateral
summary_text: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles.

name: The Godfather: Part III
summary_text: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

name: The Exorcist
summary_text: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

name: The Lives of Others
summary_text: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: Easy A
summary_text: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

name: Furious 7
summary_text: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

name: Ocean's Twelve
summary_text: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).

name: Wanted
summary_text: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

name: The Machinist
summary_text: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

name: The Breakfast Club
summary_text: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

name: Ghostbusters
summary_text: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

name: The Town
summary_text: A longtime thief, planning his next job, tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to an earlier heist, and a hell-bent F.B.I Agent looking to bring him and his crew down.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

name: Passengers
summary_text: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.

name: The Illusionist
summary_text: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

name: Dumb and Dumber
summary_text: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

name: Fast Five
summary_text: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

name: The Game
summary_text: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

name: Knocked Up
summary_text: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.

name: The Fast and the Furious
summary_text: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

name: Face/Off
summary_text: To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery to assume the identity of the criminal mastermind who murdered his only son, but the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.

name: 127 Hours
summary_text: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

name: The Mask
summary_text: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

name: 3 Idiots
summary_text: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Princess Mononoke
summary_text: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

name: 22 Jump Street
summary_text: After making their way through high school (twice), big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college.

name: The Fault in Our Stars
summary_text: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

name: Maleficent
summary_text: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

name: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
summary_text: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, aka Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

name: Men in Black II
summary_text: Agent Jay is sent to find Agent Kay and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from Kay's past.

name: Cloud Atlas
summary_text: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

name: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
summary_text: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

name: Terminator Salvation
summary_text: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

name: Inside Man
summary_text: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

name: The Italian Job
summary_text: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

name: The Fighter
summary_text: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

name: Friends with Benefits
summary_text: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

name: A Star Is Born
summary_text: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

name: Howl's Moving Castle
summary_text: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

name: Batman
summary_text: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

name: The Others
summary_text: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

name: Spider-Man: Far from Home
summary_text: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame (2019), Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

name: Mean Girls
summary_text: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

name: Die Hard 2
summary_text: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

name: Tenet
summary_text: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

name: Super 8
summary_text: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

name: Signs
summary_text: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

name: Yes Man
summary_text: A man challenges himself to say "yes" to everything.

name: The Equalizer
summary_text: A man who believes he has put his mysterious past behind him cannot stand idly by when he meets a young girl under the control of ultra-violent Russian gangsters.

name: Moon
summary_text: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

name: The Aviator
summary_text: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

name: Men in Black 3
summary_text: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

name: Boyhood
summary_text: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

name: Hotel Rwanda
summary_text: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

name: The Devil's Advocate
summary_text: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

name: The Irishman
summary_text: An old man recalls his time painting houses for his friend, Jimmy Hoffa, through the 1950-70s.

name: Wedding Crashers
summary_text: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

name: Sleepy Hollow
summary_text: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

name: Downfall
summary_text: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

name: Speed
summary_text: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

name: Mission: Impossible III
summary_text: IMF agent Ethan Hunt comes into conflict with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer who threatens his life and his fiancée in response.

name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
summary_text: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

name: Man on Fire
summary_text: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

name: 50 First Dates
summary_text: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.

name: Snowpiercer
summary_text: In a future where a failed climate-change experiment has killed all life except for the lucky few who boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, a new class system emerges.

name: Flight
summary_text: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

name: The Expendables
summary_text: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
summary_text: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

name: Monsters University
summary_text: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

name: Brokeback Mountain
summary_text: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

name: Mulholland Dr.
summary_text: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

name: The Lego Movie
summary_text: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

name: Due Date
summary_text: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

name: Raging Bull
summary_text: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
summary_text: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

name: Ocean's Thirteen
summary_text: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

name: The Ring
summary_text: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

name: Moonrise Kingdom
summary_text: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

name: Ant-Man and the Wasp
summary_text: As Scott Lang balances being both a superhero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

name: Jackie Brown
summary_text: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

name: Up in the Air
summary_text: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire presenting a new business model.

name: Seven Samurai
summary_text: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

name: Pineapple Express
summary_text: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

name: Night at the Museum
summary_text: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

name: Mission: Impossible II
summary_text: IMF agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

name: Once Upon a Time in America
summary_text: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

name: The Rock
summary_text: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

name: Jojo Rabbit
summary_text: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

name: TRON: Legacy
summary_text: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

name: True Grit
summary_text: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

name: Being John Malkovich
summary_text: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

name: The Deer Hunter
summary_text: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
summary_text: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

name: Pearl Harbor
summary_text: A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.

name: Meet the Parents
summary_text: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

name: Fantastic Four
summary_text: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.
